summary.span: Represents a Windows icon, which is a small bitmap image that is used to represent an object.

span.span: Represents a Windows icon, which is a small bitmap image that is used to represent an object.

summary.span: Icons can be thought of as transparent bitmaps, although their size is determined by the system.

span.span: Icons can be thought of as transparent bitmaps, although their size is determined by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以构造文件、 流或嵌入的资源中的对象。You can construct objects from files, streams, or embedded resources. 构造函数的列表，请参阅。For a list of constructors, see . 此外可以将转换通过使用位图方法。You can also convert an to a bitmap by using the method. 一个图标资源可以包含多个图标图像。An icon resource can contain multiple icon images. 一个图标文件可能包含多个大小和颜色深度中的映像。One icon file may contain images in several sizes and color depths. 应用程序中使用的映像取决于操作系统和设置。The image that is used in an application depends on the operating system and settings. 以下列表详细说明了一个图标的典型大小：The following list details the typical sizes for an icon: - 16 像素 x 16 像素16 pixels x 16 pixels - 32 像素 x 32 像素32 pixels x 32 pixels - 48 像素 x 48 像素48 pixels x 48 pixels ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个窗体并将以下代码粘贴到其中。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 调用`IconToBitmap`在该窗体事件处理程序，并传递`e`作为。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果与大小完全匹配，找不到版本，则使用最接近的匹配。If a version cannot be found that exactly matches the size, the closest match is used. 如果`original`参数是具有单个大小，此方法只会创建一个重复的图标。If the `original` parameter is an that has a single size, this method only creates a duplicate icon. 使用的延伸功能方法调整图标的大小。Use the stretching capabilities of the method to resize the icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建从具有指定的名称的资源`resource`参数中包含由指定的类型的程序集`type`参数。This constructor creates an from a resource with the name specified by the `resource` parameter in the assembly that contains the type specified by the `type` parameter. 此构造函数组合资源的字符串名称以及给定类型的命名空间，并查找程序集清单中的匹配项。This constructor combines the namespace of the given type together with the string name of the resource and looks for a match in the assembly manifest. 例如中传递类型和`Error.ico`到此构造函数，它将查找名为资源`System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`。For example you can pass in the type and `Error.ico` to this constructor, and it looks for a resource that is named `System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 若要运行此示例中，将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和处理该窗体事件。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and handle the form's event. 调用`ConstructAnIconFromAType`方法从事件处理程序，并传递`e`作为。Call the `ConstructAnIconFromAType` method from the event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时，您必须通过使用 dispose 的原始图标`DestroyIcon`Win32 API，以确保释放的资源中的方法。When using this method, you must dispose of the original icon by using the `DestroyIcon` method in the Win32 API to ensure that the resources are released. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 将该对象绘制到屏幕。Draws that object to the screen. - 获取图标句柄。Gets an icon handle for the . - 集图标从该句柄创建窗体的属性。Sets the attribute of the form to an icon created from the handle. - 调用 Win32 API 函数`DestroyIcon`释放资源。Calls the Win32 API function `DestroyIcon` to release resources. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当转换为位图，而生成的位图的透明颜色设置为图标透明区域都将丢失`RGB(13,11,12)`。The transparent areas of the icon are lost when it is converted to a bitmap, and the transparent color of the resulting bitmap is set to `RGB(13,11,12)`. 返回的位图为原始图标具有相同的高度和宽度。The returned bitmap has the same height and width as the original icon. > [!NOTE] > 开头的 framework 版本 4.6 支持已添加的.ico 文件中的 PNG 帧。Beginning with framework version 4.6 support was added for PNG frames in .ico files. 面向早期版本的 framework 但在 4.6 位上运行的应用程序可以通过选择使用中的新行为添加以下行将对``app.config 文件的部分：``Applications that target earlier versions of the framework but are running on the 4.6 bits can opt in into the new behavior by adding the following line to the `` section of the app.config file:`` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个窗体并将以下代码粘贴到其中。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 调用`IconToBitmap`中窗体的方法。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's . 事件处理程序，并传递`e`作为。event handler, passing `e` as .
